title: dharmaathma nannipuDu
sahitya:
dharmAtma nannipuDu daya jUDavE yana marmamuna balukunadi

mancidO



caraNam 1



patita pAvanuDani bAga pErai nIku matilEka uNDunadi mancidO



caraNam 2



gatilEni nanu nIvu kAvavE yanti sammati lEka uNDunadi

mancidO



caraNam 3



ninu jUDa padivELa kanulu kAvale naNTi manupaka uNDunadi

mancidO



caraNam 4



Emi nEranu pAdamE migula gatiyaNTi nAmIda nepamencuTa

mancidO



caraNam 5



 nIdu mAyalacEta niSthUra mEla mammAdu kOkanu uNDa mancidO

caraNam 6



nATi vacanamulella nayamu cEyavenaNTi mAtADa kuNDanadi

mancidO

caraNam 7



rAjanuta shrI tyAgarAja rakSaka shrta samAja nanu maracunadi

mincidO rAma
